feed.title: Voyager
feed.subtitle:
Welcome to "Voyager," the podcast where the frontiers of technology, cybersecurity, and scientific discovery converge. Each week, we embark on a digital odyssey through the vast and ever-evolving landscape of the internet to bring you the most intriguing and vital stories from the realms of tech and science.
In "Voyager," we delve deep into the latest advancements in technology, from groundbreaking gadgets and innovations to the software shaping our digital world. We unravel the complex and fascinating world of cybersecurity, keeping you informed about the latest threats, defenses, and trends that matter in our increasingly connected lives.
But our journey doesn't stop there. We also traverse the exciting universe of scientific discovery, bringing you cutting-edge news, interviews with thought leaders, and insights into the research that's changing our understanding of the world and beyond.
Whether you're a tech enthusiast, a cybersecurity professional, or just curious about the scientific phenomena shaping our future, "Voyager" is your guide through the complex web of modern innovation. Join us as we explore the most compelling stories at the intersection of technology, cybersecurity, and science – stories that inform, inspire, and ignite the imagination.
Subscribe to "Voyager" and stay ahead of the curve in this fast-paced digital age. New episodes drop every week, filled with expert analysis, engaging discussions, and a passion for the marvels of the internet era. Set sail with us on this journey of discovery and exploration – into the heart of what's next.

entry.title: "The AI Revolution: Exploring Technical GenAI & LLM Job Interview Questions"
entry.summary:
In the world today, there have been several significant developments in the field of technology and artificial intelligence. Microsoft has made a major announcement, expressing its commitment to enabling a cloud and AI-powered future for Thailand. This initiative is expected to have a significant impact on the country's technological landscape. Additionally, a magnificent artificial intelligence (AI) semiconductor stock has been identified as a potential investment opportunity, with experts predicting its future growth. The market for artificial intelligence in diagnostics is also projected to reach a value of USD 7.8 billion by 2032, according to a report by DataHorizzon Research. This highlights the increasing importance of AI in the field of healthcare. However, there are also concerns surrounding the dangers of AI and deepfakes, as discussed by Drew Pearce in 'The Fall Guy'. The internet has been abuzz with a viral AI video showing Katrina Kaif speaking in French, raising concerns about the growing sophistication of deepfakes.

In terms of new tools, products, or projects, Hugging Face has introduced a powerful combination of automatic speech recognition (ASR), diarization, and speculative decoding. This tool aims to enhance the accuracy and efficiency of speech-related tasks. Additionally, there is a discussion on how to push notifications in Android using Firebase in React Native, providing developers with valuable insights into mobile app development. Furthermore, Microsoft's CEO, Satya Nadella, expressed his excitement about being in Thailand and announced the opening of the company's first datacenter in the region. This development signifies Microsoft's commitment to expanding its presence and technological infrastructure in Southeast Asia.
